text: @gregpmiller Trump thinks that firing one IG, #MichaelAtkinson, will keep this horrific story quiet just as he thought,2 months too late, he could slam the door shut on the #coronavirus -from “15 sick down to 0.”To use @maddow’s fave word from last night,the fecklessness of Trump is historic.
